Verses: 1 saalomonai Avanudaiya Pidhaavin Sthaanaththil Raajaavaaga Abishegampanninaargal Endru Theeruvin Raajaavaagiya Eeraam Kelvippattu, Than Oozhiyakkaararai Avanidaththil Anuppinaan; Eeraam Dhaaveedhukku Sagalanaalum Snegidhanaayirundhaan.

3 en Thagappanaagiya Dhaaveedhin Saththurukkalaik Karththar Avarudaiya Paadhangalukkuk Keezhppaduththividumalavum, Avargal Thammai Sutrilum Seygira Yuththaththinaal, Avar Thammudaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Naamaththirku Aalayaththaik Katta, Avarukkuk Koodaadhirundhadhu Endru Neer Arindhirukkireer.
4 aanaalum Ippozhudho En Dhevanaagiya Karththar Engum Enakku Ilaippaarudhalaith Thandhaar; Virodhiyum Illai, Idaiyoorum Illai.

5 aagaiyaal: Naan Un Sthaanaththil Un Singaasanaththinmel Vaikkum Un Kumaarane En Naamaththirku Aalayaththaik Kattuvaan Endru Karththar En Thagappanaagiya Dhaaveedhinidaththil Sonnapadiye, En Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Naamaththirku Aalayaththaik Kattavendum Endru Irukkiren.

6 aadhalaal Leebanonil Enakkaaga Kedhurumarangalai Vettak Kattalaiyidum; Seedhoniyaraippola Maravettu Velai Arindhavargal Engalukkulle Oruvarumillai Enbadhu Umakkuth Theriyum; Adharkaaga En Velaikkaarar Ummudaiya Velaikkaararode Iruppaargal; Neer Solvadhinpadiyellaam Ummudaiya Velaikkaararin Sambalaththai Umakkuk Koduppen Endru Solla Sonnaan.

7 eeraam Saalomonin Vaarththaigalaik Kettapodhu, Migavum Sandhoshappattu: Andha Eraalamaana Janangalai Aalumpadi, Dhaaveedhukku Oru Gnaanamulla Kumaaranaik Koduththa Karththar Indru Sthoththirikkappaduvaaraaga Endru Solli;

8 eeraam Saalomonidaththil Manusharai Anuppi: Neer Enakku Solliyanuppina Kaariyaththai Naan Ketten; Kedhurumarangalukkaagavum, Dhevadhaari Virutchangalukkaagavum, Ummudaiya Viruppaththinpadiyellaam Naan Seyven.

9 en Velaikkaarar Leebanonil Irundhu Avaigalai Irakkik Kadalile Konduvaruvaargal; Ange Naan Avaigalaith Theppangalaagak Katti, Neer Niyamikkum Idaththukkuk Kadalvazhiyaai Anuppi, Avaigalai Avizhththu Oppippen; Ange Neer Avaigalai Oppukkondu En Janangalukku Aagaarankoduththu, En Viruppaththinpadi Seyyavendum Endru Sollachchonnaan.
10 appadiye Eeraam Saalomonukku Vendiyamattum Kedhurumarangalaiyum Dhevadhaari Virutchangalaiyum Koduththuk Konduvandhaan.

11 saalomon Eeraamin Aramanaikkup Pojanaththirkaaga Irubadhinaayirakkalam Kodhumaiyaiyum, Idiththuppizhindha Olivamarangalin Irubadhukala Enneyaiyum Koduththaan; Ippadi Saalomon Eeraamukku Varushaandharam Koduththuvandhaan.
12 karththar Saalomonukku Solliyirundhapadiye Avanukku Gnaanaththaith Thandharulinaar; Eeraamukkum Saalomonukkum Samaadhaanam Undaayirundhu, Iruvarum Udanpadikkai Pannikkondaargal.
13 raajaavaagiya Saalomon Isravelarellaarilum Oozhiyaththukku Muppadhinaayiram Amanji Aatkalaip Pidiththaan.

14 avargalil Ovvoru Maadhaththirkup Padhinaayiramperai Maatri Maatri, Leebanonukku Anuppinaan; Avargal Oru Maadham Leebanonilum, Irandu Maadham Thangal Veedugalilum Iruppaargal; Adhoneeraam Andha Amanji Aatkalinmel Visaarippukkaaranaayirundhaan.
15 saalomonidaththil Sumai Sumakkiravargal Ezhubadhinaayiramperum, Malaigalil Maram Vettugiravargal Enbadhinaayiramperum,
16 ivargalaiththavira Velaiyai Visaariththu Velaiyaatkalaik Kankaanikkiradharku Thalaimaiyaana Visaarippukkaarar Moovaayiraththu Munnooruperum Irundhaargal.
17 vettina Kallaal Aalayaththukku Asthibaaram Poda, Peridhum Vilaiyerappetradhumaana Karkalaik Konduvara Raajaa Kattalaiyittaan.
18 aalayaththaik Katta, Saalomonin Sirpaasaarigalum, Eeraamin Sirpaasaarigalum, Kipali Ooraarum, Andha Marangalaiyum Karkalaiyum Vetti Aayaththappaduththinaargal.
